member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.RainierPurpleTheme
member.summary: Implicitly applies the Rainier purple theme to all of its descendent FrameworkElements.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.RainierPurpleTheme.ThemeResourceUri
member.summary: Stores a reference to a Uri referring to the theme resource for the class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.RainierPurpleTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RainierPurpleTheme class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.RainierPurpleTheme.GetIsApplicationTheme(System.Windows.Application)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this theme is the application theme.
member.returns: True if this theme is the application theme.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.RainierPurpleTheme.SetIsApplicationTheme(System.Windows.Application,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether this theme is the application theme.
member.param: True if this theme should be the application theme.
